h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
h2_title: Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Captain Wise-Voice
content: Repeat the process of damaging its leg, or look for any opportunities to strike at its head -- particularly when it triggers the beguiling chant again to take off a chunk of your maximum HP.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Captain Wise-Voice'.
The content is as follows:
Repeat the process of damaging its leg, or look for any opportunities to strike at its head -- particularly when it triggers the beguiling chant again to take off a chunk of your maximum HP.
